Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 10 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Thief: Skill Trained (Thievery)
Experienced Smuggler: Automatically gets at least 10 on Stealth rolls to conceal a small item
Foil Senses: Automatically takes precautions against special senses when using Avoid Notice, Hide, or Sneak
Hobnobber: Can Gather Information in half normal time
Legendary Sneak: Can use Hide and Sneak without cover/Automatically uses Avoid Notice when exploring
Quiet Allies: Rolls a single Stealth check to Avoid Notice when leading a group
Swift Sneak: Can Sneak at full Speed
Terrain Stalker (Rubble): Sneaking 5' in rubble at least 10' from foes requires no Stealth check
Combat
Hit Points: 38 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (4 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 18 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Bola (+8 1d6 B R30'; dexterity; trained); Hand Crossbow (+8 1d6 P R70'; dexterity; trained); Sap (+5 1d6 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strong Arm: +10 thrown weapon range
Thief: +3 damage with finesse melee weapons
Unconventional Weaponry (Dagger): Weapon Familiarity (Dagger)
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Nimble Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class against an attack when unencumbered
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard to self on creatures that haven't acted
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Notes
Validation Errors:
